basic.description:
An independent study of the general links between tectonics and the nature of the sedimentary record in a variety of carbonate and siliciclastic depositional environments.
NOTE    This course is intended to provide an option for students in lieu of GEOL 301/1.5.
LEARNING HOURS    60 (10I;50P)
basic.subject: GEOL
basic.title: Problems in Sedimentary Geology
